Stilport - a giant virtual "sandbox" in which everything is possible - superpowers, unimaginable transport and an arsenal of weapons of extraterrestrial! Enjoy the endless possibilities of the President and show its citizens that capable of a true leader of the Saints. In Saints Row IV Saints head was elected president of the United States. But this is only the beginning! And now, with nothing comparable, inflamed catastrophic alien invasion, the madness of Saints Row series has made ??a new round - the aliens abandoned the Saints in a virtual model of their hometown Stilport. Master the supernormal grand scale and pry humanity from alien grandfather's mental acumen Zinyaka. Escape from the virtual trap that caught the Saints or die trying. Saints Row IV throws the player into the abyss of alien technology and weapons that will make every Saint in the face of ultimate destruction. Apply your alien superpowers to punch their way to the top. The advanced features and advanced customization, the player can jump off a building to building, overtaking fast sports cars, to send enemies flying power of telekinesis. All this and more in the most reckless of Saints Row!
